Open positions

üî• We are looking for new group members with passion, talent, and grit!

You will have the chance to work in the growing field of artificial intelligence and natural language processing: its use for the study of language, its interface with computer reasoning, and its application in analyzing human behaviors both within and beyond the field of computer science.

Applications for PhD positions

If you are interested in working with us as a PhD student, please send me an email. State briefly why you are interested and attach a CV, your transcripts and related publication/research experiences. Important: please insert ‚ÄúApplication PhD‚Äù in the subject line.

For University of Hawaii Masters students:

If you are a Master student at the University of Hawaii looking for a Master project, contact me per email or stop by my office. Course credit is available in the form of ICS 499, ICS 699, or ICS 700.

For University of Hawaii Bachelor students:

Interested undergraudate students with strong python programming/deep learning/NLP skills are also encouraged to contact me.
